_header: O sinful man thir are the forty days
_description: William Dunbar, ‘The maner of passyng to confessioun’ — ten stanzas rhyme royal

BLAru285.First Lines: O Synfull man þir ar þe xl dayisThat euery man sulde wilfull pouuertt dre…
BLAru285.Last Lines: …Small meritas of synnes for to IrkeQuhen þou art ald & ma na wrangis wyrke
BLAru285.Attributed Title: The maner of passyng to confessioun (rubric, f. 161)
